alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Coosa; Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 2:50AM CDT until March 26 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Autauga County in central Alabama... Northwestern Elmore County in east central Alabama... Southeastern Chilton County in central Alabama... Southeastern Coosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 249 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marbury, or 13 miles southeast of Clanton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockford, Equality, Speed, Marbury, Pentonville, Cottage Grove, Titus, Weoka Mills, Highway 9 and Highway 22, Welona, Nixburg, Verbena, Western Lake Martin, Jordan Lake, Fishpond, Ray, New Prospect and Hissop. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
